DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial compare group acceptance commitment therapy ( ACT ) usual care cancer survivor experience anxiety follow end cancer treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptance Commitment Therapy ( ACT ) Anxious Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults Greater Boulder/ Denver , Colorado area cancer complete primary cancer treatment ( surgery , chemotherapy , and/or radiation ) within previous 18 month 2 . For solid tumor cancer : Show current evidence disease solidtumor cancer ( cancer type initial stage ) . For lymphoproliferative disorder chronic lymphocytic leukemia indolent nonHodgkin 's lymphoma : In remission asymptomatic initial treatment follow active surveillance . 3 . Screen positive anxiety symptom study screener 4 . Able speak , read , write English fluently 5 . Willing able participate ACT group week 7 week 6 . Willing able complete online questionnaires phone interview designate assessment point 1 . Current moderate high suicide risk 2 . History chronic untreated trauma ( unrelated cancer ) 3 . Psychiatric hospitalization suicide attempt past 5 year
